meanings.definition: A type of primrose with multiple flowers on a single stem.
meanings.sent1: The polyanthus in the garden has beautiful yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a polyanthus in my backyard to add color.
meanings.sent3: The bees were buzzing happily around the polyanthus, enjoying the nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a polyanthus in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The polyanthus stood tall, a vibrant display of nature's beauty.

meanings.definition: A plant of the primrose family with many flowers.
meanings.sent1: The polyanthus plant in the park attracts many butterflies.
meanings.sent2: She received a bouquet of polyanthus as a gift.
meanings.sent3: The polyanthus seemed to be showing off its colorful blooms to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a fragrant polyanthus, spreading joy wherever they landed.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of polyanthus, a sight to behold in the spring.
